# GET /v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/appStoreReviewDetail | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/appStoreReviewDetail ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersions-_id_-relationships-appStoreReviewDetail)

-  GET /v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/appStoreReviewDetail 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/appStoreReviewDetail

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersions-_id_-relationships-appStoreReviewDetail#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/appStoreReviewDetail
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersions-_id_-relationships-appStoreReviewDetail#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersions-_id_-relationships-appStoreReviewDetail#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppStoreVersionAppStoreReviewDetailLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appstoreversionappstorereviewdetaillinkageresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersions-_id_-relationships-appStoreReviewDetail#see-also)
